titleStmt.title: A contrarye (to a certayne manis) consultacion: that adulterers ought to be punyshed wyth deathe Wyth the solucions of his argumentes for the contrarye. Made by George Ioye.
titleStmt.author: Joye, George, d. 1553.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Foxe, John. De non plectendis adulteris.
Place of publication and ostensible printer's name from colophon; actual printer's name and conjectured publication date from STC.
The last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
